entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
